name: Rage.MP

description:
https://rage.mp/

Modified to work with the latest version of RAGE:MP
Will automatically install linux bridge.
**This server requires 2 ports to be added for the server. the main port and the next (port+1) as ports for the server.

installation.script:
apt update
apt -y install curl tar

cd /mnt/server

echo "Downloading rage.mp"
curl -sSL -o ragemp-srv-037.tar.gz https://cdn.rage.mp/lin/ragemp-srv-037.tar.gz
curl -sSL -o bridge-linux-037.tar.gz https://cdn.rage.mp/lin/bridge-linux-037.tar.gz

tar -xzvf ragemp-srv-037.tar.gz --strip 1 -C /mnt/server
tar -xzvf bridge-linux-037.tar.gz --strip 1 -C /mnt/server

rm ragemp-srv-037.tar.gz
rm bridge-linux-037.tar.gz

chmod +x ./server

if [ -e conf.json ]; then
    echo "server config file exists"
else
    echo "Downloading default rage.mp config"
    curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/gta/ragemp/conf.json >> conf.json
fi

echo "install complete"

exit 0
